entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
